parts.text: I'll check what changed today in the default "v2" project. Let me query the recent changes from today.

input.sql:
SELECT 
  field_name,
  old_value,
  new_value,
  changed_at,
  actor_login,
  repository_name,
  content_title,
  content_url,
  field_type
FROM field_changes 
WHERE project_name = $1 
  AND changed_at >= CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY changed_at DESC

rows.old_value:
To supply the information needed for the CLI command we need to add an API endpoint to supply the data.

Endpoint should be added to coderd (should check for experiment & entitlement).

Acceptance criteria:
- bulk retrieval endpoint supporting paging with filtering (just session for now)
- ONLY administrators should be able to query this endpoint

- ONLY administrators should be able to query this endpoint

dbpurge: purge expired api keys
dbpurge: purge expired api keys

rows.new_value:
Relates to:
- https://github.com/coder/coder/pull/19725/
- https://github.com/coder/coder/pull/19667/
- https://github.com/coder/jetbrains-coder/pull/568

#19725 added an index to reduce the impact of large numbers of API keys on the UI.

#19667 adds logic to dbpurge to expire API keys belonging to the prebuilds user

jetbrains-coder#568 fixed an issue with the JetBrains plugin that caused large numbers of API keys to be created.

As a separate follow-up to this, add logic to `dbpurge` to delete expired API keys created by the JetBrains plugin to reduce the size of the database.

UI: Unable to select nested devcontainer

rows.new_value: UI: Unable to select nested devcontainer
rows.content_title: UI: Unable to select nested devcontainer

rows.new_value:
I'm experimenting with the relatively new "native" devcontainer support in Coder. I my situation, I create an "outer" or "main" pod via a kubernetes deployment - that "main" pod will contain one or more "child" devcontainers. However the coder plugin for Gateway will not let me select and connect to the "child" pods. The plugin correctly authenticates to my deployment and shows all pods - but when selecting a "child" pod, the focus will always reset to the "main" pod. I will attach a screen recording showing the behavior. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6488713a-d4d2-4584-9122-b36d1296120a My environment: JetBrains Gateway 2025.2.1 Build #GW-252.25557.133, built on August 27, 2025 Source revision: ee1e6cb62e111 Runtime version: 21.0.8+9-b1038.68 aarch64 VM: OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM by JetBrains s.r.o. Toolkit: sun.lwawt.macosx.LWCToolkit macOS 14.7.8 This IDE is managed by Guidewire Software via JetBrains IDE Services.
JetBrains IDE Services version: 2025.4.0.2089-ij251, https://gwre-ijlicvault.jetbrains-ide-services.com GC: G1 Young Generation, G1 Concurrent GC, G1 Old Generation Memory: 2048M Cores: 11 Metal Rendering is ON Registry: ide.experimental.ui=true jetbrains.tbe.auth.use.require.new.token=emergency-only Non-Bundled Plugins: com.coder.gateway (2.22.1) org.jetbrains.toolbox-enterprise-client (2025.4.0.2089-ij251)

rows.new_value: Over a three hour connection scaletest, with 6k workspaces, this query generated the most load on the DB in terms of total time, and by CPU utilization - according to CloudSQL query insights. Times called: 3460 Avg execution time (ms): 674.66 P95 execution timing (seconds): (Each of the four 'blocks' of spikes on the graph correlates with workspace traffic being simulated. i.e. when clients are connected to agents) CloudSQL Query Insights:

bug: {"message":"Failed to dial peer.","detail":"context deadline exceeded"}

rows.new_value: bug: {"message":"Failed to dial peer.","detail":"context deadline exceeded"}
rows.content_title: bug: {"message":"Failed to dial peer.","detail":"context deadline exceeded"}

rows.new_value:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [x] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

I used wsl + dockerdesktop.

i used the following:

export CODER_DATA=$HOME/.config/coderv2-docker
export DOCKER_GROUP=$(getent group docker | cut -d: -f3)
mkdir -p $CODER_DATA
docker run --rm -it \
  -v $CODER_DATA:/home/coder/.config \
  -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  --group-add $DOCKER_GROUP \
  ghcr.io/coder/coder:latest

I got {"message":"Failed to dial peer.","detail":"context deadline exceeded"}

### Relevant Log Output

```shell
Coder v2.26.0+a056cb6 - Your Self-Hosted Remote Development Platform
Started HTTP listener at http://127.0.0.1:3000
Using built-in PostgreSQL (/home/coder/.config/coderv2/postgres)
Opening tunnel so workspaces can connect to your deployment. For production scenarios, specify an external access URL
‚ïî‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïó
‚ïë               View the Web UI:                ‚ïë
‚ïë   https://htlb4lhrog1jq.pit-1.try.coder.app   ‚ïë
‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù

==> Logs will stream in below (press ctrl+c to gracefully exit):
2025-09-19 02:41:34.929 [info]  notifications.manager.notifier: started  notifier_id=b9febc43-0123-494a-906e-e484c10fc059
2025-09-19 02:41:34.933 [info]  notifications.report_generator: report generator finished  duration=3.621561ms
```

### Expected Behavior

I want to see the UI.

### Steps to Reproduce

1. prepare dockerdesktop with wsl2(ubuntu)
2. run the official command

### Environment

- Host OS: win11+wsl2(ubuntu)+dockerdesktop
- Coder version: see above


### Additional Context

_No response_

parts.text:
Here's what changed today (September 19, 2025) in the v2 project:

## Major Status Changes

**Completed Items:**
- **Status: "In Review" ‚Üí "Done"** - [Add `shared_with_group:` and `shared_with_user:` filters to /workspaces endpoint](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/1004) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T20:15:23Z)
- **Status: "In Progress" ‚Üí "Done"** - [Add warning message to tasks UI](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19739) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T17:36:07Z)
- **Status: "In Review" ‚Üí "Done"** - [flake: TestServer/CanListenUnspecifiedv4](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/946) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T12:20:57Z)

**Status Progressions:**
- **Status: "In Progress" ‚Üí "In Review"** - [Add `shared_with_group:` and `shared_with_user:` filters to /workspaces endpoint](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/1004) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T17:36:07Z)
- **Status: "In Progress" ‚Üí "In Review"** - [Refactor Create workspaces subcommand to split User and Workspace creation](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/985) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T12:20:57Z)

**New Work Started:**
- **Status: null ‚Üí "In Progress"** - [MCP: Add `coder_*_task` tools](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/776) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T17:36:07Z)
- **Status: "üìö Backlog" ‚Üí "In Progress"** - [Refactor Create workspaces subcommand to split User and Workspace creation](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/985) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T08:15:17Z)
- **Status: "üìö Backlog" ‚Üí "In Progress"** - [Create load generator for Dynamic Parameters](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/912) (changed_at: 2025-09-19T08:15:17Z)

## New Issues Created

- [Tasks: Task doesn't appear in the task list](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19894) - Status: "üìö Backlog" (created: 2025-09-19T17:14:44Z)
- [Tasks: Status isn't being updated correctly](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19893) - Status: "üìö Backlog" (created: 2025-09-19T17:11:08Z)
- [dbpurge: purge expired api keys](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19889) - Status: "üìö Backlog" (created: 2025-09-19T11:02:21Z)
- [Failed to dial peer](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19882) - Status: "üìö Backlog" (created: 2025-09-19T01:05:43Z)
- [bug: {\"message\":\"Failed to dial peer.\",\"detail\":\"context deadline exceeded\"}](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19883) - Status: "üìö Backlog" (created: 2025-09-19T02:48:31Z)

## Assignment Changes

- **Assignees: [] ‚Üí ["rafrdz"]** - [feat: prompt User to add missing `var` in CLI](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19782)
- **Assignees: [] ‚Üí ["BrunoQuaresma"]** - [Improve task creation UX: avoid auto-redirect to encourage background agent workflow](https://github.com/coder/coder/issues/19675)
- **Assignees: [] ‚Üí ["code-asher"]** - [MCP: Add `coder_*_task` tools](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/776)
- **Assignees: [] ‚Üí ["spikecurtis"]** - [Create load generator for Dynamic Parameters](https://github.com/coder/internal/issues/912)
- **Assignees: null ‚Üí ["fioan89"]** - [UI: Unable to select nested devcontainer](https://github.com/coder/jetbrains-coder/issues/574)

## Issue State Changes

- **State: "OPEN" ‚Üí "CLOSED"** - Multiple issues including the shared_with_group filters issue and the tasks UI warning message issue
- **State: null ‚Üí "OPEN"** - Several new issues were created and opened

## Pull Request Updates

Several pull requests were merged, including:
- [feat: add best effort attempt to revoke oauth access token in external auth provider #19775](https://github.com/coder/coder/pull/19775) - **MERGED** (2025-09-19T14:27:02Z)
- [feat(site): display warnings in tasks page when wildcard is not configured #19780](https://github.com/coder/coder/pull/19780) - **MERGED** (2025-09-19T13:49:34Z)

The day shows significant progress with 3 items completed, several items moving through the development pipeline, and new issues being triaged and assigned to team members.
